channel.title: Natural - Health - Freedom Radio | Alternative Medicine | Nutrition | Orthomolecular | Healthy Diet
channel.description:
Health Empowerment was a Radio Show featuring Natural Health Expert, Croft Woodruff and co-host Peter Schaad.
Health Empowerment News is a new show following in the spirit of the old radio show. It can found foods are NOT Drugs.com Learn about your natural health options, meet the industry experts, and uncover the politics of health. Croft Woodruff, PHD
Croft Woodruff is literally a walking enclycopedia of natural health. Croft is former president of the Canadian Health Food Association, past president of the BC Chelation Therapy Association and Cofounder of the Health Action Network. Researcher, lecturer, broadcaster with over 15 years on the radio with his own health show. Croft has an honorary Master Herbalists designation and holds an honorary membership in the Naturopathic College of Quebec. He was awarded a PHD in Philosphy for lifetime achievement.
With 40 years in the Natural Health industry Croft has seen it all.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Taking control of your health - All you have to lose are the side effects!
channel.itunes:author: Andrew McGivern

item.title: Health Empowerment News Summary - Episode 1
item.description: http://www.foodsarenotdrugs.com/podcasts/henews The Health Empowerment News Podcast resides at FoodsareNOT Drugs.com and is a weekly podcast focusing on natural health, alternative medicine and health freedom. Taking off where the Health Empowerment Radio Show left off, the new HE News podcast delivers quality natural health news every week. This episode at Podomatic is a summary episode highlighting the key points of the original episode. This feed will continue to post summary episodes of Health Empowerment News podcasts. To listen to the whole episodes go to the Foods are NOT Drugs podcast page. Featuring Croft Woodruff, PhD and co-host Andrew McGivern. This episode highlights the first HE News episode which covered... "What the Ancients Knew that Modern Medicine Forgot" Many natural remedies that were used throughout history have been forgotten by modern medicine in favor of adopting an intellectual property based synthetic chemical model of disease treatment. These natural remedies have been passed done through the ages and many are effective to this day. Show Notes: The old wives tail, "Feed fever, starve a cold" holds true. The native peoples around the world understood the value of sweat lodges and saunas when dealing with a fever. Food as Medicine: Natural Foods, Vitamins, Herbs, Nutrients, Micro-Nutrients, Phyto-Nutrients all prevent and treat disease. Listen to Health Empowerment News every week: * learn about your natural health options * learn about drug induced nutrient depletion * discover the latest natural remedies * find out how to protect your health naturally * what supplements are the most important? * Natural remedies that should be well known but aren’t! Health Empowerment News is a Podcast Hero Production. Podcast Consultant in Vancouver

item.title: Health Empowerment | Episode 20 - The Platinum Energy System Foot Detox Spa with Kellyann Andrews part 2
item.description: http://www.luniquespa.com Health Empowerment Episode 20 Part 2 2of 4 DETOXIFICATION and the Platinum Energy System Kellyann Andrews from Platinum Energy Systems joins Peter and Dr. Steve Tyers to talk about the need for detoxification and how the detox foot spa works. ------------------------------------------------------------ Creating a Healing Environment: * What helps your body to remove the causes of illness? * What helps your body heal itself? * What restores balance to the system? The solution is to create a healing environment: Just think of a fish aquarium where you never changed the water. What would happen to the water? What would happen to the fish? Those fish are your cells and they need a pure, clean, healthy environment in order to live and thrive. People generally, and the Baby Boomer generation in particular, are becoming increasingly intolerant of body breakdowns. We want to look perfect, feel perfect, and live to a great age, full of vitality and agility. With the Platinum Energy Systems™ Detox Foot Spa, you will be joining many others who now “feel the difference” as they create their own clean internal healing environments. The Platinum Energy Systems Detox Foot Spa is effective because it is an easy method of cleansing. It provides the best environment to create optimal health and healing. What does the Platinum Energy Systems Detox Foot Spa do? There are more sweat glands in your feet than anywhere else in your body. The Platinum Energy Systems Detox Foot Spa assists you to expel accumulated toxins naturally. In doing so, the system accentuates the body’s natural detox functions, quickly and easily, with no discomfort or healing crisis. Once the session begins, you may see the results almost instantaneously. The Detox Foot Spa stimulates the 2,000 eccrine glands in each foot and causes them to expel their contents into the water, detoxifying your body’s accumulated toxins naturally, in a subtle but profound manner. By encouraging your body to do what it needs to do, the Platinum Energy Systems Detox Foot Spa assists your body to perform its own individual self-healing. Welcome to detoxifying the Platinum Energy Systems way - not only refreshing but relaxing. item.title: Health Empowerment | Episode 20 - The Platinum Energy System Foot Detox Spa with Kellyann Andrews part 4
item.description: http://www.luniquespa.com Health Empowerment Episode 20 Part 4 of 4 DETOXIFICATION and the Platinum Energy System Kellyann Andrews from Platinum Energy Systems joins Peter and Dr. Steve Tyers to talk about the need for detoxification and how the detox foot spa works. --------------------------------------------------------------- Frequently Asked Questions - Platinum Energy Detox Foot Spa Why do you need to cleanse your body? Your body needs to cleanse itself daily of toxins that result from the intake of foods, water, and air you breathe. When there are more toxins than nutrients in the cells of your body, you will notice a lack of pep and energy. This is your body’s message that “something is wrong” and needs correction. all the feeling came back into my legs and feet How do toxins build up? Detoxification is the body’s natural process for eliminating or neutralizing toxins via the liver, the kidneys, perspiration, and exhalation. Ever since the industrial revolution and the post-World War II petrochemical industry, toxins have been accumulating in the human body faster than they can be eliminated. The body absorbs toxins from our environment. The toxins include such things as industrial chemicals, pesticides, food additives, heavy metals, tobacco, and air pollution. How many sessions do I need? Initially, a series of up to 10 sessions are recommended – once or twice a week. This allows your body to completely purge the accumulated toxins and get your body clean. Once clean, a monthly or bi-monthly maintenance program is recommended to ensure that toxins do not re-accumulate due to absorption from environmental exposure. The appropriate number of sessions will be determined by your body – your feeling of well-being – your energy levels. What can I expect to feel? While each person’s experience is entirely different (according to the type of toxins and which systems of the body have been stressed), most people experience a re-balancing period directly after the session. While you can resume normal daily activities following your session, it is recommended that you allow some time to rest and relax afterwards, so your body can more easily and quickly “re-calibrate.” Some people have felt tired following their sessions, while others felt an immediate rejuvenation and rebound in their energy levels. It all depends on what is going on with each individual and his or her body. (See testimonials). Can everyone use the system? If an individual has been quite sick, we recommend that he or she should go through the process at a slower pace. A schedule of once a week or every other week would be advisable, as the process of detoxification continues even after the session has formally ended. Drinking more water is extremely beneficial and we encourage you to drink more during and after your session (and always!). (Dehydration – the lack of enough water in your body – is one of the common denominators of all diseases!) The following conditions are contraindicated for those planning to have a Platinum Energy Systems™ session:: * People with pacemakers * People who have had organ transplants * People who suffer from psychotic episodes or seizures * People with epilepsy * During pregnancy or lactation * Open wounds on feet * Children under the age of 5 years old Will the water change colour even when there are no feet in the water? Yes – due to the chemical interaction of the water, salt, and the ionic exchange occurring with the array. Part of the colour change occurs because of the natural oxidation of the metal (the array). Why does the water change colour? The chemistry of salt, water, metal (the array), and sweat combine to cause the change in colour. This is a normal process. The colour will vary according to the chemistry found in the water. What is meaningful is the content of the water, not the colour. While it is interesting to see the different colours with different people, we recommend that attention and focus be placed on what the individual is experiencing internally, as opposed to what is happening externally (in the water). How does this process of detoxification work? There are more sweat glands in your feet per inch than anywhere on your body. The array creates an energetic effect that assists the detoxification process by drawing the content out of the sweat glands into the water. The salt increases the conductivity of the water so that the effect can occur. Hence, the colour changes seen in the water are related to the chemical interaction. What waste products are expelled by the sweat glands in the feet? “Eccrine sweat is produced via merocrine secretion in the coiled gland, and is composed of water, sodium, potassium lactate, urea, ammonia, serine, ornithine, citrulline, aspartic acid, heavy metals, organic compounds, and proteolytic enzymes. Eccrine sweat then passes through the acrosyringium and is deposited on the skin surface.” Goldsmith, L.A. “Biology of eccrine and apocrine sweat glands.” In I.M. Freedburg, A.Z. Eisen, K. Wolff, et al, eds. Fitzpatrick's Dermatology in Internal Medicine. 5th ed. New York: McGraw-Hill, 1999: chap 11. What do I have to do? You will sit in a chair and place your feet in a Platinum Energy Systems™ foot spa of warm, salt water for 30 minutes. All you need to do is relax and rest. Will it remove medications from my body? No – only toxins are removed from the sweat glands in your feet. No vitamins, minerals, or medications are excreted. The only thing that is “downloaded” is your waste by-products and your accumulated toxins! Health Empowerment Episode 20
Part 4 of 4
DETOXIFICATION and the Platinum Energy System
Kellyann Andrews from Platinum Energy Systems joins Peter and Dr. Steve Tyers to talk about the need for detoxification and how the detox foot spa works.
--------------------------------------------------------------- Frequently Asked Questions - Platinum Energy Detox Foot Spa
Why do you need to cleanse your body?
Your body needs to cleanse itself daily of toxins that result from the intake of foods, water, and air you breathe. When there are more toxins than nutrients in the cells of your body, you will notice a lack of pep and energy. This is your body’s message that “something is wrong” and needs correction. all the feeling came back into my legs and feet
How do toxins build up?
Detoxification is the body’s natural process for eliminating or neutralizing toxins via the liver, the kidneys, perspiration, and exhalation.
Ever since the industrial revolution and the post-World War II petrochemical industry, toxins have been accumulating in the human body faster than they can be eliminated.
The body absorbs toxins from our environment. The toxins include such things as industrial chemicals, pesticides, food additives, heavy metals, tobacco, and air pollution.
How many sessions do I need?
Initially, a series of up to 10 sessions are recommended – once or twice a week. This allows your body to completely purge the accumulated toxins and get your body clean. (continued)

item.title: Health Empowerment | Episode 18 - Bill C51 - Is everything ok now after the amendments? Jim Strauss and Anthony Stephan discuss
item.description: www.podcasthero.com Health Empowerment Episode 18 Part 1 of 4 Tony Clement announced amendments to Bill C51 which he claims will make the food and drug act more balanced and will create a third catagory for Natural Health Products. The amendments to Bill C-51 should not deter people from opposing this legislation... listen to this show to find out why! The National Post published a couple of articles and one of them was not favorable to the fight against Bill C51 and claimed that the backlash was only a couple of companies who have a grudge against Health Canada causing all the controversy. Both those companies will be on the show today to talk about the latest developments… Anthony Stephan from Truehope and Jim Strauss from The Strauss Herb company. item.title: Health Empowerment | Episode 18 - Bill C51 Is the fight over? Jim Strauss and Anthony Stephan discuss. Part 4
item.description: www.podcasthero.com Health Empowerment Episode 18 Bill C-51 Part 4 of 4 Tony Clement announced amendments to Bill C51 which he claims will make the food and drug act more balanced and will create a third catagory for Natural Health Products. The amendments to Bill C-51 should not deter people from opposing this legislation... listen to this show to find out why! The National Post published a couple of articles and one of them was not favorable to the fight against Bill C51 and claimed that the backlash was only a couple of companies who have a grudge against Health Canada causing all the controversy. Both those companies will be on the show today to talk about the latest developments… Anthony Stephan from Truehope and Jim Strauss from The Strauss Herb company. item.title: Health Empowerment | Episode 16 - Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy with Dr. Ratansi part 1 of 4
item.description: http://www.podcasthero.com Health Empowerment Episode 16 - Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy with guest,Dr. Zayd Ratansi. Part 1 of 4 Dr. Zayd Ratansi is the special guest this week and he joins Croft and Peter to talk about the latest research and breakthroughs in Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy. Dr. Ratansi is a Naturopathic Doctor who has been specializing in Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy for over 10 years. He give us his insights and talks about the research catching up with his own clinical observations and proving the value of this exciting therapy. Also Dr. Steve Tyers talks about other therapies such asbout the Bio-Energetic Scan technology and the Targeted Longevity Care plan which is now available through Omira Health Centers. Health Empowerment Episode 16 - Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy with guest,Dr. Zayd Ratansi.
Part 3 of 4
Dr. Zayd Ratansi is the special guest this week and he joins Croft and Peter to talk about the latest research and breakthroughs in Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy. Dr. Ratansi is a Naturopathic Doctor who has been specializing in Hyperbaric Oxygen Therapy for over 10 years. He give us his insights and talks about the research catching up with his own clinical observations and proving the value of this exciting therapy. Also Dr. Steve Tyers talks about other therapies such asbout the Bio-Energetic Scan technology and the Targeted Longevity Care plan which is now available through Omira Health Centers.

item.title: Health Empowerment Episode 14 | True Hope III with Dr. Goldstein
item.description: http://www.podcasthero.com Health Empowerment Episode 14 - Truehope with Dr. Estelle Goldstein Part 1 of 4 Croft Woodruff and Peter Schaad welcome Medical Doctor and Psychiatrist Dr. Estelle Goldstein to the show this week. Dr. Goldstein has been using natural products and techniques to treat serious mental illness including Truehope's EMPower Plus product for Bipolar Affective Disorder. BIO: ESTELLE TOBY GOLDSTEIN, MD is a psychiatrist certified by the American Board of Psychiatry and Neurology; a former surgeon, neurologist and neurosurgeon, and has a special credential in psychopharmacology. She is known as "The Renegade Doctor" and operates a VERY independent private practice based in San Diego, CA where she concentrates on helping people get OFF of prescription medicines and onto natural substances for a variety of illnesses. She is also a researcher, currently involved in the first double-blind, placebo-controlled test of a natural treatment for bipolar illness. item.title: Health Empowerment Episode 12 - The Targeted Longevity Plan and Bill C51
item.description: http://www.podcasthero.com Detoxification Foot Bath! Health Empowerment Episode 12 - The Targeted Longevity Plan and Bill C51 Part 1 of 4 Dr. Steve Tyers, Clinical Director of Omira Health Centers is on the show to discuss the Bioscan and the Targeted Longevity Care Plan as well as his thoughts on Bill C51. The Full Body Scan allows Dr. Steve to identify all the areas of weakness within the body and can identify conditions developing before they are symptomatic or detectable by conventional means. In conjunction with a consultation with Croft Woodruff Dr. and an ECG heart test with the Cardio DM06 Dr. Steve can put together a custom tailored Targeted Longevity Care Plan that meets the specific identified needs of the patient. Listen this week as Croft Woodruff and Peter Schaad discuss this technology with Dr. Steve Tyers. http://www.luniquespa.com Detoxify your Body! item.title: Health Empowerment Episode 10 - Shawn Buckley and Bill C51
item.description: http://www.podcasthero.com Join the Community! Health Empowerment Episode 10 - Shawn Buckley, the NHPPA and Bill C-51 Part 1 of 4 Shawn Buckley is on the show again this week to discuss the proposed Bill C51 which could radically change the natural health products industry. --------------- The Immediate Threat The immediate threat facing the Natural Health Product industry is the implementation of the drug-style Natural Health Product Regulations. The NHPPA is concerned that the industry is: * being subjected to drug-style regulations that are too onerous for the risk profile presented by Natural Health Products; * open to arbitrary attacks by the regulatory body; * unprepared for upcoming challenges such as cost recovery for the Natural Health Product Directorate, and increasingly onerous standards for site and product licenses. The NHPPA believes that the industry cannot afford to be inactive while: * the new NHP Regulations are driving small and medium manufacturers out of business; * manufacturers continue to drop low selling Natural Health Products due to the high cost of compliance; * the NHP Regulations unduly increase the cost of products; * the NHP Regulations drive products from the market that Canadians depend upon for their health; * the majority of NHP License applications are denied under Regulations that were to legitimize the industry. At this point almost 60% of license applications have been either refused or withdrawn. These are primarily license applications for single ingredient products. The NHPPA expects that the percentage of license refusals will increase as the NHPD starts considering multi-ingredient products. In short, the industry will remain largely illegal, or the majority of NHPs will have to be taken off of the market; * innovation on new products grinds to a halt as it becomes clear that novel multi-ingredient products will not pass Health Canada’s scrutiny without drug-style evidence in the form of clinical trials; * natural health products that consumers, retailers and distributors depend upon are stopped at the border due to non-compliance with the NHP Regulations. Other Threats facing the Natural Health Product Industry Although the Natural Health Product industry is facing an immediate threat with the imposition of the drug-style NHP Regulations, there are other threats lurking in the background. These threats include: * international treaties Canada and the United States are participating in such as CODEX; * the imposition of ever stricter standards upon the industry by Health Canada and the Food and Drug Administration in the United States; * the seizure of products at the border between the United States and Canada. Currently, the main problem is U.S. products entering Canada. However, with the imposition of stricter standards on dietary supplements by the F.D.A., there is a real risk that the F.D.A. will adopt the Health Canada approach of stopping products at the border; * the imposition of ever-widening intellectual property right agreements and treaties that will affect the Natural Health Product industry. The Natural Health Product industry cannot afford to focus solely upon the immediate threat posed by the drug-style NHP Regulations. All threats to the industry need to be addressed. item.dc:creator: Andrew McGivern
item.itunes:summary:
http://www.podcasthero.com Join the Community!
Health Empowerment Episode 10 - Shawn Buckley, the NHPPA and Bill C-51
Part 1 of 4
Shawn Buckley is on the show again this week to discuss the proposed Bill C51 which could radically change the natural health products industry.
---------------
The Immediate Threat
The immediate threat facing the Natural Health Product industry is the implementation of the drug-style Natural Health Product Regulations. The NHPPA is concerned that the industry is:
* being subjected to drug-style regulations that are too onerous for the risk profile presented by Natural Health Products; * open to arbitrary attacks by the regulatory body; * unprepared for upcoming challenges such as cost recovery for the Natural Health Product Directorate, and increasingly onerous standards for site and product licenses.
The NHPPA believes that the industry cannot afford to be inactive while:
* the new NHP Regulations are driving small and medium manufacturers out of business; * manufacturers continue to drop low selling Natural Health Products due to the high cost of compliance; * the NHP Regulations unduly increase the cost of products; * the NHP Regulations drive products from the market that Canadians depend upon for their health; * the majority of NHP License applications are denied under Regulations that were to legitimize the industry. At this point almost 60% of license applications have been either refused or withdrawn. These are primarily license applications for single ingredient products. The NHPPA expects that the percentage of license refusals will increase as the NHPD starts considering multi-ingredient products. In short, the industry will remain largely illegal, or the majority of NHPs will have to be taken off of the market; * innovation on new products grinds to a halt as it becomes clear that novel multi-ingredient products will not pass Health Canada’s scrutiny without drug-style evidence in the form of clinical trials; * natural health products that consumers, retailers and distributors depend upon are stopped at the border due to non-compliance with the NHP Regulations.
Other Threats facing the Natural Health Product Industry
Although the Natural Health Product industry is facing an immediate threat with the imposition of the drug-style NHP Regulations, there are other threats lurking in the background. These threats include:
* international treaties Canada and the United States are participating in such as CODEX; * the imposition of ever stricter standards upon the industry by Health Canada and the Food and Drug Administration in the United States; * the seizure of products at the border between the United States and Canada. Currently, the main problem is U.S. products entering Canada. However, with the imposition of stricter standards on dietary supplements by the F.D.A., there is a real risk that the F.D.A. will adopt the Health Canada approach of stopping products at the border; * the imposition of ever-widening intellectual property right agreements and treaties that will affect the Natural Health Product industry.
The Natural Health Product industry cannot afford to focus solely upon the immediate threat posed by the drug-style NHP Regulations. All threats to the industry need to be addressed.
